statements: SELECT * FROM multimedia_content
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM multimedia_content
SELECT content_type, content_url FROM multimedia_content
SELECT content_url FROM multimedia_content
SELECT content_id, content_url, content_type FROM multimedia_content
SELECT content_id, content_type, content_url FROM multimedia_content WHERE content_type = 'image' ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM multimedia_content WHERE content_type IN ('video', 'audio') ORDER BY content_type ASC, content_id DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_url FROM multimedia_content ORDER BY content_id ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT DISTINCT content_type FROM multimedia_content WHERE content_id > 100 ORDER BY content_type ASC;
SELECT content_id, COUNT(content_type) AS content_count FROM multimedia_content GROUP BY content_id HAVING content_count > 1 ORDER BY content_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_description FROM images WHERE image_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT image_id, image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE image_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT image_id, image_description FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE image_id = 2;
SELECT image_id, image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE image_id > 5;
SELECT image_id, image_description FROM images WHERE image_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Images;
SELECT image_name, image_id FROM Images ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM Images WHERE image_name ILIKE 'cat%';
SELECT video_name, video_duration FROM Videos WHERE video_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Images WHERE image_name LIKE 'example%';
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM Images ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE video_duration > '00:10:00';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT video_url, duration FROM videos WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM likes WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY liked_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT image_url, uploaded_at FROM images WHERE user_id = 10 AND uploaded_at >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT video_url, duration FROM videos WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY duration ASC, uploaded_at DESC;
SELECT u.name, i.image_url, v.video_url FROM users u JOIN images i ON u.id = i.user_id JOIN videos v ON u.id = v.user_id WHERE u.id IN (1, 2, 3);
